Alabaster Snowball: Nyanshell

None »

The Elf's Request

The Terminal Riddle

The Solution

Try and log into the shell, but Nyan cat comes in

The hint was about chattr, which changes the attribute on a file.

Attempting to log in just shows Nyancat

Going into Alabaster’s directory, I can see the success app. I also used “sudo -l” to see what I can SUDO. Chattr is one I can use sudo with.

The bashrc file has a resource ID that is different when the terminal is opened. And the date indicates that bashrc is being changed for every player.

The hint says he can’t overwrite his shell. File dates are key hints in Kringlcon. Looking at the files in /bin, there is an nsh, that is probably nyanshell

The lattr and sh show that nsh is immutable but could be overwritten

I just need to copy “bash” to “nsh” after I remove the immutable bit

Su as alabaster gets it working

Alabaster then reveals a hint. The Frido Sleigh context has a capta. There is a talk about machine learning that might help

Terminal Success

The Hint
